item.title: YardMapp: Streamlining Yard Maintenance and Landscaping Services
item.description: YardMapp is a revolutionary app that connects homeowners with landscaping and yard maintenance professionals. With features like sprinkler system and lighting mapping, service requests, and provider ratings, YardMapp simplifies yard care and fosters long-lasting relationships between homeowners and service providers.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
